Game.Name: M&M's - Blast! (USA)
Game.plot: M&M's Blast! is a Puzzle game, developed by Pipe Dream Interactive and published by Majesco Games, which was released in 2001.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/567503.html
Game.Notes: M&M's Blast! for Game Boy Advance reunites players with those lovable candy-coated M&M characters--Red, Blue, Green, and Yellow--in a brand-new adventure. Players complete a number of game challenges within a variety of board-game-style levels.
